text: “Basi jenumanja galagatilagani chilichose chanchisachile changaŵaga Jwalakwe.” Jilani: “Chisimu ŵakwasika ni aŵala ŵatachilijasikasya (Mbepo) achimisyene kwisa soni maŵasa gao lisiku lya Kiyama (ligongo lya itendo yao yangalumbana yaŵaliji nkutenda kuduniya), manyililani yanti kwalakweko ni kwasika kwakuonechela.”
